metadata.title: Suburban 3600A 3-Burner Slide-in Cooktop - Black
features: Great for pairing with convection microwave
Made with strong, durable materials and parts
description: The slide-in 3 burner Suburban RV cooktop is ideal for installation paired with a convection microwave instead of an oven. Features piezo ignition burners that allow for match-free ignition. One-piece rattle-free grate is made of sturdy, heavy-gauge porcelain-enamelled steel.
